name: FREE RPG asset tileset demo pack (Super Retro World by Gif)

description:
FREE playable demo : discover some game assets from this BIG collection ! ✨Amazing graphics ✨Plug-and-play packages ✨Versatile ressources It's that simple : you save time AND money !

FREE RPG asset tileset demo pack (Super Retro World by Gif) by Gif (itch.io)

Ko-fi supporters will receive a download key for the  Exterior Pack💖 Check the "thank you" message !

⤴️ Update week 39 : Launch !

This free game will present some of the available asset pack of the Super Retro World game asset collection !

DISCLAIMER : Scan-lines have been added in this demo. Please, consider the screeshots available in the various pack webpages to have a better idea of the global rendering.

🎮 Features 

  • Exterior environnements :
    • Exterior Pack
    • Winter Pack
    • Desert Pack
    • Marketplace Pack

Tile size is 16x16.
